name: qstr
description: Performs a query string query. Returns true if the provided query string matches the row.

params.name: query
params.description: Query string in Lucene query string format.

params.name: query
params.description: Query string in Lucene query string format.

examples:
from books 
| where qstr("author: Faulkner")
| keep book_no, author 
| sort book_no 
| limit 5;
